com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game

Class AbstractBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.AbstractBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridTextBoard

    public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jack Mueller on 2/23/15. A board defines connections between Territories, it has different constraints based on its size, amount of Players, and other factors in Configuration. It has many initial states for each set of constraints.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BOARD_SIZE_LARGE 
      static int BOARD_SIZE_MEDIUM 
      static int BOARD_SIZE_SMALL 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractBoard(Configuration config)
      Saves the configuration used for making this game because it is important for balancing the number of Players that start with Territories.

      This helper method finishes the instantiation of the TerritoryBorders in board by connecting adding to TerritoryBorder.neighbors in a way defined by the subclass' implementation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractBoard

        public AbstractBoard(Configuration config)
        Saves the configuration used for making this game because it is important for balancing the number of Players that start with Territories.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration which defines constraints for the start states of this board.

    • Method Detail

      • startState

        public void startState(Configuration config)
        Puts the board in an appropriate state to start the game. Assigns Players some Territories, and values to those Territories. Amount of territories that are assigned are based on the amount of players and the value of Configuration.colorlessTerritory.
        Parameters:
        config - the same Configuration that was used to create this board.

      • generateLayout

        protected abstract java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> generateLayout()
        Returns:
        A well ordered list of TerritoryBorders.

      • generateGridConnections

        protected abstract java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> generateGridConnections(java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> board)
        This helper method finishes the instantiation of the TerritoryBorders in board by connecting adding to TerritoryBorder.neighbors in a way defined by the subclass' implementation.
        Parameters:
        board - A well ordered list of TerritoryBorders
        Returns:
        The same well ordered list of TerritoryBorders, which now have data on their neighbors in a well defined structure.

      • getBoard

        public java.util.List<TerritoryBorder> getBoard()
        A list of the existing borders (one for each Territory).
        Returns:
        The list of TerritoryBorder objects in an order defined by a subclass implementation.
